TITLE: ΔΡΑΧΜΗ
LOCALDEF: drachma (100 in a mina, 6000 in a talent)

TITLE: ΑΛΛΟΣΕ
LOCALDEF: to another place; to other places

TITLE: ΑΝΑ
LOCALDEF: Up along; at the rate of

TITLE: ΠΑΝΤΩΣ
LOCALDEF: in all ways, in any case

TITLE: ΠΡΟ
LOCALDEF: In front of, before the time of, in preference to

TITLE: ΕΧΩ
LOCALDEF: Have; be able (plus infinitive); be disposed (plus adverb)

TITLE: ΦΑΙΝΩ
LOCALDEF: bring to light; (middle)  appear (+ inf) be clearly (+ partic)

TITLE: ΦΥΩ
LOCALDEF: Caused to grow; (imperfect) be inclined by nature (plus infinitive)

TITLE: ΠΟΡΕΥΩ
LOCALDEF: to bring, mid. Journey Go, walk

TITLE: ΤΕΛΕΥΤΑΩ
LOCALDEF: Bring or come to an end

TITLE: ΕΛΕΕΩ
LOCALDEF: have pity on, show mercy to

TITLE: ΑΡΑ/2
LOCALDEF: [introduces a question; ἄρ’ οὐ/μη expecting the answer “yes”]

TITLE: ΑΥΤΟΣ
LOCALDEF: 1) with article "the same" (idem), 2) w/o article intensive (ipse), 3) oblique cases 3rd pers pronoun (eum)

TITLE: ΓΑΡ
LOCALDEF: for (καὶ γάρ "since in point of fact")

TITLE: ΜΕΧΡΙ
LOCALDEF: to, up to, as far as

TITLE: ΟΠΟΣΟΣ
LOCALDEF: as many as, as great as

TITLE: ΟΠΩΣ
LOCALDEF: how, in what way; introduces purpose clause

TITLE: ΟΥΝ
LOCALDEF: therefore, then, in fact (μὲν οὗν  no, rather . . . on the contrary)

TITLE: ΤΟΣΟΥΤΟΣ
LOCALDEF: so great, so large, so much

TITLE: ΩΣΤΕ
LOCALDEF: so that (introduces result clase or alone as particle of inference)
